${ModID}:TheFool.NAME: The Fool
${ModID}:TheFool.DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 给予 !M! 层 虚弱 。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Justice.NAME: Justice
${ModID}:Justice.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:TheHermit.NAME: The Hermit
${ModID}:TheHermit.DESCRIPTION: Discard 一张牌。 Draw cards equal to its cost. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:TheHermit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 一张牌。 Draw cards equal to its cost.

${ModID}:TheHangedMan.NAME: The Hanged Man
${ModID}:TheHangedMan.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you 抽一张牌 本回合, ALL enemies lose !M! 生命.

${ModID}:TheTower.NAME: The Tower
${ModID}:TheTower.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If this kills an enemy, play a copy of this card.

${ModID}:Death.NAME: Death
${ModID}:Death.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Kill the enemy if they have 10% or less of their max 生命 afterwards.

${ModID}:Temperance.NAME: Temperance
${ModID}:Temperance.DESCRIPTION: 抽一张牌 for each card in your 消耗 pile. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:Temperance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 抽一张牌 for each card in your 消耗 pile.

${ModID}:TheHierophant.NAME: The Hierophant
${ModID}:TheHierophant.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Remove all your debuffs. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:TheSun.NAME: The Sun
${ModID}:TheSun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to the highest 生命 enemy. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:TheChariot.NAME: The Chariot
${ModID}:TheChariot.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you discard 一张牌 during your turn, 获得 !M! Vigor.
